page.title: 04LIFE STYLES GOLDSBORO'AREA
page.content: There are two{Public houses}in our area,the{Bay Horse Inn, Goldsborough {and the Tiger Inn, Coneythorpe.}Both are very popular for drinking and eating. The games you play in{Pubs }are usually things like{cards,darts,pool} and{dominoes.}People usually have a side bet! Some pubs have inter-pub tournaments. Popular pub foods are{scampi,chips, {steak,gammon and mixed grills.}They are served with{chips}and/or{salad. Food is served on a plate or in a basket with sauces such as{tomato,}and {salad cream. If people do not have a proper meal they often enjoy a packet of{crisps or {peanuts}with their drink.The most popular drinks are{lager }and{beer.
